maqras.text: yaqinan imaan waalo ne falaah haasil karli
jo apni namaaz mein khushu karte hai
jo laghwiyaath se mu mod lete hai
jo zakaath adaa karne waale hai
jo apni sharamgaaho ki hifaazath karne waale hai
bajuz apni biwiyo aur milkiyath ki laundiyo ke, yaqinan ye malaamato mein se nahi hai
jo us ke siva kuch aur chaahe, wahi hadh se tajaawuz kar jaane waale hai
jo apni amaanto aur waade ki hifaazath karne waale hai
jo apni namaazo ki nigehbaani karte hai
yahi waaris hai
jo firdaus ke waaris honge, jahaa wo hamesha rahenge
yaqinan hum ne insaan ko mitthi ke jauhar se paida kiya
phir ose nutfa bana kar, mehfooz jageh mein qaraar de diya

phir nutfe ko hum ne jama hoa qoon bana diya, phir us qoon ke luthde ko gosh ka tukda kar diya, phir gosh ke tukde ko haddiyaa bana di, phir haddiyo ko hum ne gosh pehna diya, phir dosri banaawat mein us ko paida kar diya, barkato waala hai wo Allah, jo sab se behetreen paida karne waala hai
us ke baadh phir tum sab yaqinan mar jaane waale ho
phir qayaamath ke din bila shuba tum sab uthaaye jaoge
hum ne tumhaare upar saath asmaan banaaye hai aur hum maqluqaath se ghaafil nahi hai
hum ek sahih andaaz se asmaan se paani barsaate hai, phir ose zameen mein tehra dete hai aur hum us ke le jaane par yaqinan qaadir hai
osi paani ke zariye se hum tumhaare liye khajuro aur anguro ke baghaath paida kar dete hai, ke tumhaare liye un mein bahuth se mewe hote hai, unhee mein se tum khaate bhi ho
aur wo daraqth jo toor seena pahaad se nikalta hai, jo tel nikaalta hai aur khaane waale ke liye saalan hai
tumhaare liye chau paayo mein bhi badi bhaari ibrath hai, un ke peto mein se hum tumhe doodh pilaate hai, aur bhi bahuth se nafe tumhaare liye un mein hai, un mein se baaz baaz ko tum khaate bhi ho
aur un par aur kashtiyo par tum sawaar karaaye jaate ho

yaqinan hum ne Nuh(alaihissalaam) ko us ki khaum ki taraf rasool bana kar bheja, us ne kaha ke aye meri khaum ke logo, Allah ki ibaadath karo aur us ke siva tumhaara koyi maboodh nahi, kya tum (us se) nahi darte

us ki khaum ke kaafir sardaaro ne saaf keh diya ke ye to tum jaisa hee insaan hai, ye tum par fazilath aur badaayi haasil karna chaahta hai, agar Allah hee ko manzoor hota, to kisi farishte ko utaar ta, hum ne to ise apne agle baap dadaao ke zamaane mein suna hee nahi
yaqinan us shaqs ko junoon hai, pas tum ose ek waqte muqarrar tak dheel do
Nuh (alaihissalaam) ne dua ki, aye mere rab! un ke jhutlaane par tu meri madad kar

to hum ne un ki taraf wahi bheji, ke tu hamaari aankho ke saamne hamaari wahi ke mutaabiq ek kashti bana, jab hamara hukm aa jaaye aur tanvvor ubal pade, to , tu har qism ka ek ek joda us mein rakh le aur apne ahal ko bhi, magar un mein se jin ki baabath hamaari baath pehle guzar chuki hai, qabardaar jin logo ne zulm kiya hai, un ke baare mein, mujh se kuch kalaam na karna, wo to sab duboye jayenge
jab tu aur tere saathi kashti par ba itmenaan baith jaao, to kehna ke sab tareef Allah ke liye hee hai, jis ne hamein zaalim logo se najaath ataa farmaayi
aur kaha ke aye mere rab! mujhe ba barkath jageh utaar aur tu hee behetreen utaarne waala hai
yaqinan us mein badi badi nishaaniya hai aur hum beshak azmaayesh karne waale hai
un ke baadh hum ne aur bhi ummath paida ki
phir un mein, khud un mein se (hee) rasool bhi bheja ke tum sab Allah ki ibaadath karo, us ke siva tumhaara koyi maboodh nahi, tum kyo nahi darte

aur sardaraane khaum ne jawaab diya, jo kufr karte thein aur aaqirath ki mualaqaath ko jhutlaate thein, aur hum ne unhe dunyawi zindagi mein khush haal kar rakha tha, ke ye to tum jaisa hee insaan hai, tumhaari hee quraak ye bhi khaata hai aur tumhaare peene ka paani hee ye bhi peeta hai
agar tum ne apne jaise hee insaan ki taabedaari karli, to beshak tum saqt qasaare waale ho
kya ye tumhe is baath ka waada karta hai, ke jab tum mar kar sirf qaak aur haddi reh jaoge, to tum phir zinda kiye jaoge
